vote.title: Authorize an application for the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department Outdoor Recreation Legacy Partnership Grant Program in an amount up to $10,000,000.00 to help establish a new central park in the City’s International District (informally known as the Valley View-Galleria area) in north Dallas - Financing:  No cost consideration to the City (potential future costs, see Fiscal Information)
